name: Tian Lang
info:
He often yawns and appears disorderly, and frequently plays an active part in revitalizing the team's spirits.
The fact is though, he's a very thoughtful person with a warm exterior and a cold interior, who does not easily reveal his true feelings.
description:
An employee of Mirroria Nursery and a lover of flowers. Because he's responsible for the promotion and daily care of the plants for the nursery, he earned the nickname, "Manager."

In reality, he is the top Executor of District 7 with unfathomable strength. However, few know about this secret of his, being regarded as the "Ace in the Hole" of District 7, only acting when Mirroria is in crisis.

During a battle with an Abyssant, he fended off an Abyssant's energy attack with his left hand, which left it severely burned. After undergoing tissue regeneration surgery, in order to fight better, he donned an armored glove that matched the combat characteristics of his weapon "Thunderbreaker."

skills.name: Mizar
skills.description: While on the ground, initiate 6 attacks in a row with Thunderbreaker. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 90.5% of ATK plus 5 and knock the target back. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 67.9% of ATK plus 4 and knock the target back. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 123% of ATK plus 6 and knock the target back. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 217.9% of ATK plus 11 and knock the target back. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 222% of ATK plus 12 and knock the target back. Sixth Attack: Deal damage equal to 291.8% of ATK plus 15 and launch the target.

skills.name: Megrez
skills.description: While airborne or after jumping once, use normal attack to attack 5 times in a row in mid-air. First Attack: Deal damage equal to 87.4% of ATK plus 5. Second Attack: Deal damage equal to 83% of ATK plus 4. Third Attack: Deal damage equal to 126.7% of ATK plus 7. Fourth Attack: Deal damage equal to 229.4% of ATK plus 12. Fifth Attack: Deal damage equal to 256.5% of ATK plus 14.

skills.name: Phecda
skills.description: While on the ground, tap and hold normal attack to trigger. Deal damage up to 342% of ATK plus 18 to the target and gather enemies around you.

skills.name: Merak
skills.description: Tap and hold normal attack while airborne, or use normal attack while climbing, jumping backward, or using the Jetpack to trigger. While falling, deal damage equal to 38% of ATK plus 2 each hit. Upon landing, deal damage equal to 285% of ATK plus 15 to nearby targets.

skills.name: Dodge
skills.description: Dodge right before getting hit to trigger Phantasia, reducing the speed of enemies within the area. Become immune to hitstun while dodging for 0.5 seconds.

skills.name: Alioth
skills.description: Tap normal attack during the short period after dodging. Dash to attack the target, dealing total damage equal to 172.6% of ATK plus 9.

skills.name: Dubhe
skills.description: Unleash a barrage of attacks, dealing damage equal to 936.9% of ATK plus 49 to enemies in range, and transforms enemies and your summons within a certain range into Electrified Entities, which allow up to 3 Electrified Entities exist at a time. Cooldown: 30 seconds. Gain Volt Sense when Dubhe is used: Scan the other two equipped weapons when unleashing skills. Each time a volt weapon is sensed, volt ATK increases by 6% for 25 seconds. Electrified Entity: When unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge, Electrified Entities unleash volt area damage equal to 5% of missing HP (no less than 100% volt ATK, no more than 1,000% volt ATK). When using Thunderbreaker, unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge skill consumes 30% of current HP to deal additional volt damage equal to 50% of the consumed HP (no less than 480% volt ATK, no more than 3,000% volt ATK) and gain temporary invincibility (unavailable in Apex League). 8 seconds later or when HP is lower than 10%, recover 5% missing HP every second for 8 seconds (not affected by healing effects). The recovery effect cannot be stacked.

skills.name: Obliterator
skills.description: When weapon charge is full or Phantasia is triggered, upon switching to this weapon, remove all debuffs from the wielder. Thunderbreaker unleashes wide-range volt damage, dealing total damage equal to 844.6% of ATK plus 44 and transforms enemies or your summons within a certain range into Electrified Entities. Up to 3 Electrified Entities can exist at a time. Electrified Entity: When unleashing any volt weapon discharge skill, Electrified Entities unleash volt area damage equal to 5% of missing HP (no less than 100% volt ATK, no more than 1,000% volt ATK). When using Thunderbreaker, unleashing any volt weapon skill or discharge consumes 30% of current HP to deal additional volt damage equal to 50% of the consumed HP (no less than 480% of volt ATK and no more than 3,000% of volt ATK) and gain temporary invincibility (unavailable in Apex League). After 8 seconds or when HP is lower than 10%, recover 5% missing HP every second for 8 seconds (not affected by healing effects). The recovery effect cannot be stacked.

weapon_type.name: Volt
weapon_type.description: When the weapon is fully charged, the next attack will strongly paralyze targets for 1 second and electrify them for 6 seconds, removing all their buffs and dealing damage equal to 144% of ATK. Targets can't receive any buffs for the next 6 seconds.

weapon_resonance.name: Volt Reaction
weapon_resonance.description: Volt Reaction: Increase volt ATK by 20% and volt resistance by 40%. Activate by equipping 2 or more volt weapons. This set effect works in the off-hand slot. Cannot stack with other Volt Resonance or Volt Reaction effects, with Volt Resonance taking precedence.

advancement: Gain 1 stack of Superconductor per charge: Increase Max HP by 7.5% but increase damage received by 2% (except when the current HP is lower than 8 times of volt ATK and no HP Shield is equipped), stacking up to 8 times. Lose 1 stack if no Superconductor gets refreshed within 6 seconds.
Increase the current weapon's base ATK growth by 16%.
Release any volt weapon skill or discharge skill to get 2 charges. Gain hyperbody at 8 Superconductor stacks.
Increase the current weapon's base HP growth by 32%.
Each Superconductor stack increases final damage by 1%.
Boost Dubhe's Volt Sense: For every 1 other volt weapon sensed, gain 10% volt damage boost for 25 seconds.

traits.description: Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains 1 free dodge attempt, up to 2 attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by {0}% for 8 seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.

Each use of volt weapon skill or discharge skill gains 1 free dodge attempt, up to 3 attempts. When volt weapon skill and discharge skill are used simultaneously, increase volt damage by {0}% for 8 seconds. This effect cannot be stacked.
